if (mGoogleApiClient == null) {
            mGoogleApiClient = new GoogleApiClient.Builder(this)
                    .addConnectionCallbacks(this)
                    .addOnConnectionFailedListener(this)
                    .addApi(LocationServices.API)
                    .build();
        }


This is my code for building a googleApiClient, however the second 'this' is underlined, as it it looking for a connectionCallback rather than a activity. 

I tried to implement these when starting the class:

    GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener

However, i get this error: 

    Class MapsActivity must be either declared abstract or implement abstract method 'OnConnectionSuspended(int)' in 'ConnectionCallbacks'


Could anyone help me with this problem?
